update umc_metric_template set metric = #{metric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from umc_metric_template where del_flag!=1
AND metric LIKE CONCAT('%','${metric}','%')
AND classify=#{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
